title: Case, 1813 or later
creditline: Gift of Katrina H. Becker in memory of her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Charles V. Hickox
description: Rectangular box (a) covered in dark green leather with stamped gilt bands and borders; hinged lid decorated with gilt borders and a cartouch comprising a crown surmounting flowing ribbons and drapery surrounding an eagle encircled by a chain of office(?) with the letter "N" in shield, and pendant medal.  Two hook closures at front.  Interior lined in tan suede and fabric, with wells for cabaret service pieces; rectangular suede cushion (b).

tombstone.epitaph:
Case, 1813 or later.
1813 or later. leather, wood, fabric, metal. Gift of Katrina H. Becker in memory of her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Charles V. Hickox. 1981-38-9-a,b.
